name: Neon Bumpercars
description:
Welcome to the circus of Fun! Smash around in real cars simulating Bumpercars jusrt like you are at a fair but a whole lot more excitment and smashing. You get a nice bright old yellow Dodge Charger that is clocked for 160 and when you hit, you hit hard! 3 minutes in the ring with a pack of hungry wolves trying to destroy only you! Can you stay in the RING!

The android version is free because it has ads at the menu only.
